oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kibbles Café ad
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Business Districts
Advertisements; African American business enterprises; Restaurants
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This advertisement is for a restaurant owned by Lee Thomas Kibble. Mr. Kibble was a cook, and died in Murfreesboro in 1940. The Murfreesboro Union was an African American newspaper owned and operated by Mary Ellen Vaughn. Ms. Vaughn was a nurse, newspaper editor, and founder of the Vaughn Training School in Murfreesoro.
